text: Hey guys! happy friday! i have a user who is trying to implement a custom effect for a CTA on some of their website pages and is experiencing an issue, which they believe is due to a conflict on the page (but they don't know what the conflict is): does anyone have any suggestions/tips/or thoughts to help point them in the right direction: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Share-Your-Work/CTA-transparent-hover/m-p/254015>. Thank you in advance and enjoy the weekend! :slightly_smiling_face:
kind of surprised support helped with that request. it’s like just barely in within their scope I’d imagine.
I was surprised as well! It must have been something they were passionate about learning, or happened to know! Thanks for looking into it :slightly_smiling_face:

Hello fellow HS devs! is the /blog a built-in URL in HubSpot? Can I re-map it to a custom landing page instead? Because when I try to change the landing page's URL to /blog it says that the page already exists... ta!
Or can I rename a blog that has existing articles?
the default blog is at /blog, you can change the url under content settings. then you could have a page there
